**Government of Canada Tender Notice**

**Title:** Chiller Maintenance Services, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Lethbridge Research and Development Centre

**Reference Number:** 01R11-24-C011

**Solicitation Number:** cb-4228-4532067

**Publication Date:** 2023-03-14
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-25T16:00:00

**Description:**

The Lethbridge Research and Development Centre at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking a contractor to provide chiller maintenance services for refrigeration and decommissioning work on various centrifugal and scroll chillers.

**Contract Requirements:**

* Performance of chiller maintenance services on an "as and when requested" basis
* Task authorizations (TA) delivery for identified users
* Contract period of one year with an option for up to three additional one-year periods
* Expected start date is June 1, 2023

**Security Requirements:**

* Contractor/offeror personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

**Site Visit**

* Bidders are encouraged to attend a site visit on March 28 at 10:00 a.m. MDT
* To confirm attendance, please contact Brad Patterson, Acting Facility Manager, by March 24

**Selection Criteria:**

* Bids will be assessed based on the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including technical and financial evaluation criteria
* A responsive bid must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria and be declared responsive

**Submitting Tenders:**

* Tenders must be submitted by email to melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca and aafc.wscprocurement-csoapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**

* None
